name: Lycanroc Midnight Form
description: The Wolf Pokémon. It has no problem ignoring orders it doesn’t like. It doesn’t seem to mind getting hurt at all—as long as it can finish off its opponent.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage, and its speed is doubled in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Any attack made by or against this Pokémon has advantage.
